body: Understanding open data is the first step to using it. This module looks at what open data is, and why it it is needed in the physical activity sector.
displayTitle: 1. Open data in the physical activity sector
title: 1. Open data in the physical activity sector

_skills.outcome: Explain the need for open data in the physical activity sector

body: Physical activity providers can use open data to get more people involved, create better experiences for participants and run their organisations more efficiently. This module looks how the public sector, businesses and individuals are creating impact with open data.
title: 2. Creating impact from open data

_skills.outcome: Describe the benefits of working with open data
Describe successful case studies of using and publishing open data

body: Prioritising which data to publish openly can be difficult. This module looks at how to prioritise which physical activity data to publish for the biggest impact.
title: 3. Prioritising data to publish openly

_skills.outcome: Name ‘identifying shared goals’ as the key factor to consider when prioritising which data to publish
Explain why opportunity data should be a priority to publish in the physical activities sector

body: Publishing open physical activity data can bring you a wide range of benefits. But for you and your users to enjoy those benefits, your data needs to be of a good enough quality to use. This module looks at what quality data is and provides some simple checks to minimise problems.
displayTitle: 4. How to make your data useful
title: 4. How to make your data useful

_skills.outcome: Define the benefits of quality open data
Describe two guidelines for open data quality

body: In previous modules we've looked at what open means. In this module we will explore different degrees of openness, what the future looks like and the journey to get there.
displayTitle: 5. The potential futures of physical activity data
title: 5. The potential futures of physical activity data

_skills.outcome: List a number of datasets that fit in each future
Match physical activity data to the appropriate future
Explain the process for choosing a data future
Address challenges related to an open data future

body: One of the big questions that results from opening up data is "What will happen to those operating in the sector and how will their businesses be affected?". This module looks at how the current market and the impact an open future will have on businesses within the physical activity sector.
displayTitle: 6. Business in an open data led physical activity sector
title: 6. Business in an open data led physical activity sector

body: One of the big questions that results from opening up data is "What will happen to those operating in the sector and how will their businesses be affected?". This module looks at how the current market and the impact an open future will have on business models within the physical activity sector.
displayTitle: 6OLD. Business in an open data led physical activity sector
title: 6OLD. Business in an open data led physical activity sector
